methods.getHandle:
Gets a handle to the replayer.

:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.replay.ReplayerHandle) handle to the replayer.
methods.isDone:
Has the replayer finished replaying all data.

:return: (boolean) true if the replayer has finished replaying all data; false otherwise.
methods.replay:
Prepares a historical table for replaying.

:param dataSource: (io.deephaven.engine.table.Table) - historical table to replay
:param timeColumn: (java.lang.String) - column in the table containing timestamps
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.Table) dynamic, replayed version of the table.
methods.replayGrouped:
Prepares a grouped historical table for replaying.  This method can be faster than the ungrouped replay, but
 the performance increase comes with a cost.  Within a group, the data ordering is maintained.  Between groups,
 data ordering is not maintained for a time interval.

:param dataSource: (io.deephaven.engine.table.Table) - historical table to replay
:param timeColumn: (java.lang.String) - column in the table containing timestamps
:param byColumn: java.lang.String
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.Table) dynamic, replayed version of the table.
methods.replayGroupedLastBy:
Prepares a grouped historical table for replaying as a last-by table.

:param dataSource: (io.deephaven.engine.table.Table) - historical table to replay
:param timeColumn: (java.lang.String) - column in the table containing timestamps
:param groupingColumns: (java.lang.String...) - columns used as the key in computing last-by
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.Table) dynamic, replayed version of the last-by table.
methods.schedule:
Schedule a task to execute.

:param task: (java.util.TimerTask) - task to execute
:param delay: (long) - delay in milliseconds before first executing the task
:param period: (long) - frequency in milliseconds to execute the task.
methods.setTime:
Sets the current replay time.

:param updatedTime: (long) - new replay time.
methods.waitDone:
Wait a specified interval for the replayer to complete.  If the replayer has not completed by the
 end of the interval, the method returns.

:param maxTimeMillis: (long) - maximum number of milliseconds to wait.

text: An interface for replaying historical data as simulated real-time data.
